Question: In the movie 'Gully Boy' (2019), what role do MCs play in relation to hip-hop culture?
Options:
A. MCs are the founders of hip-hop culture.
B. MCs are a part of the hip-hop culture.
C. MCs are opposed to hip-hop culture.
D. MCs have no connection to hip-hop culture.
Answer: MCs are a part of the hip-hop culture.
